name: PregnancyReportEditFlagsVS
title: ValueSet - Pregnancy Report Edit Flags (NCHS)
description: This valueset contains codes to represent Pregnancy Report Edit Flags. This valueset is based on [PHVS_PregnancyReportEditFlags_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=BD25B456-85EC-45D7-B578-1024EE2920F4). Used for MothersHeight, MothersDeliveryWeight, MothersPrepregnancyWeight, NumberPrenatalCareVisits
